artist: Manufacturer: Félix Bracquemond; Manufacturer: Creil & Montereau Pottery
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Joseph W. Brown, Jr.
description: scalloped edge; faience design of large central pink flower with scroll behind; edged in blue pattern
markings: \'B. [underlined], in black, incorporated into design on top; \'P\' and \'CM [intertwined]/DÉPOSÉ\', in black, on bottom; \'-\' (Partial letter?), stamped, on bottom
title: Dinner Plate, from 'Fleurs et Rubans' service
